channel.title: Geodetector on Wenbo Lv
channel.description: Recent content in Geodetector on Wenbo Lv

item.title: Spatial Stratified Heterogeneity (SSH)
item.description: Statistical Modeling of Spatially Stratified Heterogeneous Data Geodetector: Principle and prospective Understanding and extending the geographical detector model under a linear regression framework Information Consistency-Based Measures for Spatial Stratified Heterogeneity A local indicator of stratified power An optimal parameters-based geographical detector model(OPGD) Spatial association detector (SPADE) Robust geographical detector (RGD) An interactive detector for spatial associations (IDSA) A locally explained heterogeneity model for examining wetland disparity (LESH) Identifying determinants of spatio-temporal disparities in soil moisture of the Northern Hemisphere using a geographically optimal zones-based heterogeneity model (GOZH)
